summary:
Replaces the texture of enchantment by Elven symbols (from LOTR)
Apply the texture on weapons on the body and certain spells or both.
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the texture of enchantment by Elven symbols (for LOTR)
Apply the texture on weapons on the body and certain spells or both.

How to Install :

For replace the enchantment effects put "enchflameproject01.dds" and/or "darkswirls.dds" into " TESV > Data > Textures > effects "

enchflameproject01.dds = Weapons
darkswirls.dds = Body effects and spells

~ See pictures for more details :p
author: Aldreyn
